languages.text: "Ладно". {n}Арбитр поднимает перед собой железную ладонь и медленно сжимает пальцы в кулак.{/n} "Вас когда-нибудь ели заживо? Меня — да".
"Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."
languages.original_text: "Ладно". {n}Арбитр поднимает перед собой железную ладонь и медленно сжимает пальцы в кулак.{/n} "Вас когда-нибудь ели заживо? Меня — да".

traits.locale_text: "Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."

languages.text: 「いいでしょう」{n}彼は金属の手を上げ、ゆっくりと拳を握りしめた。{/n}「生きたまま喰われたことはありますか？私はあります」
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."

traits.locale_text: 「いいでしょう」{n}彼は金属の手を上げ、ゆっくりと拳を握りしめた。{/n}「生きたまま喰われたことはありますか？私はあります」

languages.text: "Also gut." {n}Er hebt seine Metallhand und ballt sie langsam zur Faust.{/n} "Seid Ihr jemals lebendig gefressen worden? Ich schon."
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."

traits.locale_text: "Also gut." {n}Er hebt seine Metallhand und ballt sie langsam zur Faust.{/n} "Seid Ihr jemals lebendig gefressen worden? Ich schon."

languages.text: « Très bien, {n}acquiesce-t-il en levant sa main métallique avant de serrer le poing.{/n} Vous êtes-vous déjà fait dévorer {mf|vivant|vivante} ? Moi oui. »
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien, {n}acquiesce-t-il en levant sa main métallique avant de serrer le poing.{/n} Vous êtes-vous déjà fait dévorer {mf|vivant|vivante} ? Moi oui. »

languages.text: «Muy bien». {n}Levanta su mano metálica y la cierra lentamente hasta formar un puño.{/n} «¿Alguna vez le han comido {mf|vivo|viva}? A mí sí».
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien». {n}Levanta su mano metálica y la cierra lentamente hasta formar un puño.{/n} «¿Alguna vez le han comido {mf|vivo|viva}? A mí sí».

languages.text: “好吧。”{n}他举起金属手臂，慢慢攥成了拳头。{/n}“你有过被人活生生啃掉胳膊的经历吗？我有。”
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."

traits.locale_text: “好吧。”{n}他举起金属手臂，慢慢攥成了拳头。{/n}“你有过被人活生生啃掉胳膊的经历吗？我有。”

languages.text: "Pekâlâ." {n}Metal elini kaldırıp yavaşça yumruk yapıyor.{/n} "Hiç canlı canlı yendiniz mi? Ben yendim."
languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ." {n}Metal elini kaldırıyor ve yavaşça yumruk yapıyor.{/n} "Hiç canlı canlı yendiniz mi? Ben yendim."

languages.original_text: "Very well." {n}He raises his metal hand and slowly clenches it into a fist.{/n} "Have you ever been eaten alive? I have."
